name: Instagram Redesign - The Graphic Design Way
description:
I have done many changes yet kept the original structure. I added a banned in the profile which looks cool and will allow brand and businesses to brand their profile in a much better way and people will be able to personalize it to a greater extent as well.


I added a long bio option, you can extend the bio to reveal the long bio and extra buttons, which you can add.


I also changed how the description and stuff below a post on the main feed is displayed, I made it in a way that it will motivate people subconsciously to scroll more,


I also added a repost button, this will allow users to repost that post in their profile in a different tab which is not yet been added, it will be like the tag tab, but it will display the posts you reposted, this will help Instagram to increase user engagement and time they spent on the platform.


This was an impulse built, for fun, I am also available to design a super engaging and elegant website or an app for you.


ENJOY
